main.name: Haley Lowe
main.description: utilizing creative problem solving to build web applications that meet real world needs
main.bio: My name is Haley, I am a MERN stack developer. I want to use my mind for inquiry and the ability to learn quickly to make a positive impact through technology. I am eager to grow my skills in Web Development.
main.contactmessage: I'd love to connect with you.

resume.skillmessage: 4 years of experience with youth overseas and in the states with differing ability levels. I am ready to use my experiences with a myriad of people and cultures to build useful and innovative web applications

education.school: UC Davis Continuing and Professionsal Education
education.description: Six month intensive program for fullstack [MERN] development

education.degree: B.A. Intercultural Leadership & B.A. Social Science
education.description: Interdisciplinary studies in business, leadership, theology, global studies and psychology with a goal to lead and serve in multi-ethic environments

testimonials.text: Your repo was nicely documented with detailed usage instructions

Your javascript is solid and you've done an excellent job on this challenge. You included the basic and bonus requirements and have done a great job of showcasing them . . . Looking at your code you've followed the major best practices for structuring your files including your logic, and your database. Impressive!
Nice work, Haley! . . . [Y]ou were able to generate a readme based on the criteria specified from the node.js inquirer prompt.
